name: seti-icons
description: The awesome icons provided by Seti UI theme.
readme:
# Seti Icons

[![apm][apm-image]][apm-url]
[![apmi][apmi-image]][apmi-url]

> The awesome icons provided by Seti UI theme.

![Seti UI](https://github.com/jesseweed/seti-ui/raw/master/screenshot-icons.png)

## Settings

| Name | Type | Default | Description |
|---|---|---|---|
| No Color | Boolean | false | Enables/disable color icons. |

## Change Log

[Full Change Log](changelog.md)

### v1.2.1 (05/31/2016)
- Fix `No Color` setting, again ([#30](https://github.com/wyze/atom-seti-icons/issues/30) via [245ec03](https://github.com/wyze/atom-seti-icons/commit/245ec03d239738cd5ce9a22308576a7113fc7d57))

## Credits

Thank you to [Jesse Weed](//github.com/jesseweed) for making the original Seti UI theme.
